I've helped install all kinds of residential battery systems. This Modular, stackable battery from EcoFlow is one of my favorites. Not only is it SUPER easy to expand with more  capacity at any time - but in a real emergency - its super portable. Meaning not only can you help yourself - but if your neighbors or family needs assistance somewhere else - you can bring power to them very easily. 

If you need solar panels and roof racking sent over in a bundled DIY Kit built specific for your home - talk to my partners at Solar Wholesale here: https://solarwholesale.com/jerry-rig-everything/

title: This Solar Battery Can Save Texas
